description: The erection of a roof level extension to the existing offices  together with alterations to boundary treatment on City Garden Row.The origanal proposals have been revised again with the elevation of the roof extension facing Graham Street revised  the plant adjoining the Public House screened  a brick wall and railings are proposed to replace the existing fence in City Garden Row  revisions to the Graham Street elevation of the main building.The applicants are also proposing that the extension should be a steel structure stating that this will minimise any disruption to existing occupants and adjoining residents. The drawings are available at the Planning Department  227-229 Essex Road  N1 during office hours and at your Neighbourhood Office.
decision_conditions: APPLICATION WITHDRAWN DUE TO NO REPLY TO LETTER DATED 24.07. 89. DJH ASSUMES APP. HAS LOST INTEREST & SENT FURTHER LETTER DATED 04.05.90 TO INFORM OF WITHDRAWAL
